title: can anyone please identify the font for Lambeth Council?
content:
Hi there

I would be eternally grateful (well for a couple of hours at least!) if anyone can help me to find the name of the font used in the Lambeth Council Logo. the url for the homepage is [http://www.lambeth.gov.uk/home.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022231349/http:/www.lambeth.gov.uk/home.htm)

Thanks in advance for any suggestions offered.

Cheers

ben

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [LAMBETH\_LOGO.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022231349/http:/typophile.com/files/LAMBETH_LOGO.jpg) | 10.59 KB |
author: breadesign

comments.content: This reminds me of some of the custom work done by Jeremy Tankard for the [British Airports Authority](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022231349/http:/www.typography.net/commissions/project/british_airports_authority).
